#summary REST API Reference

= Key =

  * IID = itemId, integer > 0
  * TID = tagId, integer > 0
  * RID = relationId, integer > 0
  * RVSN = relationVersion, integer > 0
  * CID = commentId, integer > 0
  * FMT = "xml" | "json"
  * KEY = structure element name, eg: "relationName", camelcase, case-sensitive

|| GET || /api/item/IID || read-item-data ||
|| GET || /api/item.FMT || list-items ||
|| POST || /api/item.FMT || create-item ||
|| DELETE || /api/item/IID.FMT || delete-item ||
|| GET || /api/item/IID.FMT || read-item ||
|| POST || /api/item/IID.FMT || update-item ||
|| DELETE || /api/item/IID/KEY.FMT || delete-item-key ||
|| GET || /api/item/IID/KEY.FMT || get-item-key ||
